ca.mcgill.ecse211.Localization

Class Angle_Localization

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.Localization.Angle_Localization

  • public class Angle_Localization
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is in charge to make the robot's orientation exactly pointing in the right direction.
    Author:
    Tritin and Alexandre

    • Method Detail

      • fix_angle

        public void fix_angle()
        Method to stop with wheel track parallel to grid line The robot must be put in forward motion before calling the method. The light sensor will stop its motor when it detects the line. The other motor will continue to approach the line until it detects it and stops. It will then correct the odometer angle heading.

      • angle_correction

        public void angle_correction()
        Method to correct the odometer angle. Takes the previous heading to know in which direction the robot is facing. Sets the angle to the heading it is supposed to be, since the robot is parallel with the grid line.
